main.name: Yakini Arumuga Kani
main.bio: Hi !!! My name is Yakini. I am a Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp graduate at the University of Utah. Hands-on experience in various technologies helped me build responsive websites that focus mainly on rich user experience.My interest is developing projects on the MERN stack as it is more smooth, comfortable, and exciting.I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Engineering. I had worked as Programmer Analyst and as a Test Engineer.I look forward to new web development opportunities and find a workplace where I can apply my skills and widen my knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details..

education.degree: Certificate in Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp

work.title: Performance Test Engineer
work.description: Executed Manual and Performance Testing for various applications

projects.title: Shifty Planner
projects.category: Shift management and time keeping system with a focus on the needs of first responders. Technologies Used : MongoDB, Node, Express, React

projects.title: The Fight Club
projects.category: Real time gaming app where two users can fight with each other, and at the end of the game displays their scores. Technologies Used : Node, Express, SocketIO, MySQL, Handlebars

testimonials.text: Yakini is a proactive and tireless contributor who naturally rises to the occasion when presented with something she is passionate about. She's always the first one to take initiative, be it solving complex problems, being there for someone in their hard time, or turning a heated discussion into a civilized conversation. She comes with a great attitude, a can-do spirit, and delivers products with passion, and is one of the highly-rated developers on my list.
